newsitem.title: UK: DNIB sets 300 million guilder 10-year bond.
newsitem.headline: DNIB sets 300 million guilder 10-year bond.

text.p: The following bond was announced by lead manager ING Barings.
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 101.285 PAY DATE 08.JAN.97
NOTES ** 25 BP OVER 8.5 PCT JUNE 2006 DSL
MOODY AA3 LISTING AMST PAY FREQ =
S&P AA+ DENOMS (K) 5-50-1M SALE LIMITS US/UK
NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT YES FORCE MAJ YES
GOV LAW DUTCH HOME CTRY NETHER TAX PROVS DOMESTIC
NOTES NIBSTATING IS JOINT LEAD MANAGER
